channel.description:
Hello,
I want to change the time in whonix workstation to my local _correct_ time I am from germany and i want if it is here 8 pm, in the workstation is 8 pm either. But if i change my timezone by dpkg_reconfigure tzdata to Europe / Berlin in my workstation is 7 pm. i cant fix my problem. I run Whonix in Virtualbox. My host has got the correct time 8 pm. I know it is not recommended to do it, but i want to change the time Can you help me?

item.title: Change time in Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t think we can support this at the Whonix project. We try to make users anonymous. Making everyone using Whonix appear the same as all other Tor users.

Simulating a specific fingerprinting is going down the rabbit hole. We strongly recommend using Tor Browser. Which has a very specific fingerprinting, that is easily detected as being Tor Browser. Whatever your system time zone setting is, Tor Browser uses UTC anyhow.

And if you were to use iceweasel (firefox), you wouldn’t have any fingerprinting protection at all.
